social_links.title: Check out my Open Source Projects!

questions.question: What do you like doing best?

answer.kristi: I'm happiest when I'm building dynamic, engaging experiences for people on the web.
answer.bill: I like being the man behind the curtain.

questions.question: What are your favorite development tools?

answer.kristi: I love doing front-end development for anything built in Ruby, Python, and lately, NodeJs. I also prefer to work with SASS over plain CSS.

questions.question: What have you been working on lately?

answer.kristi: At work, I have been building mobile-friendly responsive survey "widgets". These are used by thousands of surveyers daily at YouGov across many countries!

questions.question: What do you do for fun?

answer.kristi: I just started CrossFit! I like to work out, play video games (Guild Wars 2!), and paint.
Bill and I have been building a CMS Network for Small Businesses. We have some very enthusiastic clients that have helped us test. It's going great so far!
